Articles.Content: My old boat with a real big amount of intakes got 30m/s and now it gets 13 at most and it takes it ten hours to get there. Please help me boat fans. Am I using the wrong engine? Are there now buoyant parts for 1.0.5 different than 1.0.4. The boats mass is 10 tons.
Boyancy was completely overhauled in 1.0.5. You can use empty fuel tanks as flotation devices now. Water will now produce lift, drag as it should. I guess your intaks just make for a lot of drag.
Thx a lot. This has helped me. I'll try it when I get to my pc.
